title: High Ping on the OCE Server
body:
I usually have around 150-130 ping normally but then the ping changed to around 330-27o starting September.

I read this thread and followed all the instructions https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/lXl4ziZ0-high-ping-ms-with-the-new-update

https://pastebin.com/h3dHLv50 to my WinMTR
http://n2.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=36a470be-5025-9578538a-521e-433d-a940 to the Netalyzr results

Thank you in advance

replies.body:
Hi

I answered a similar question from a player in Singapore here - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/s3IE2jWz-constant-high-ping-for-singapore-players?comment=0000

TL;DR - If you're in south-east asia, you'll have much higher than normal ping for the next few weeks due to a major undersea cable being cut.

Cheers
Mindstar
Thanks for your reply! I thought it was problems on my part at first.
Also I used to have around 290 ping on the NA server but now it gotten kinda better to 260
